duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in the progressive care unit, monitoring and treating patients with critical conditions.
Administer medications and IV therapy, ensuring accurate dosages and patient response.
Document patient care activities and maintain accurate medical records using EMR systems.
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and healthcare team members to ensure optimal care coordination.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams and participate in critical care interventions as needed.
Manage time efficiently, prioritize patient needs, and work effectively in a team environment.
